column2: UPDATE 3-U.S. FDA expands approval of Merck's Keytruda to lung cancer Oct 2 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Friday approved Merck & Co Inc's immunotherapy
column4: for patients with the most common form of lung cancer whose tumors produce a specific biological marker.

column2: UPDATE 1-Delta says third-quarter unit revenue down 4.5-5.5 pct Oct 2 Delta Air Lines Inc on Friday said its third-quarter unit revenue continued to fall during the year's busiest travel season but hinted that financial metrics were already improving.

column2: McDonald's calls for FIFA's Sepp Blatter to step down immediatelyMcDonald's calls for FIFA's Sepp Blatter to step down immediately NEW YORK McDonald's  joined calls on Friday for FIFA President Sepp Blatter to resign immediately after Swiss authorities said they had opened a criminal investigation into the head of the world soccer body.  McDonald's calls for FIFA's Sepp Blatter to step down immediately NEW YORK McDonald's  joined calls on Friday for FIFA President Sepp Blatter to resign immediately after Swiss authorities said they had opened a criminal investigation into the head of the world soccer body. column2: FDA approves Merck's Keytruda for use in lung cancerUPDATE 3-U.S. FDA expands approval of Merck's Keytruda to lung cancer Oct 2 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Friday approved Merck & Co Inc's immunotherapy
column4: for patients with the most common form of lung cancer whose tumors produce a specific biological marker.  UPDATE 3-U.S. FDA expands approval of Merck's Keytruda to lung cancer Oct 2 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Friday approved Merck & Co Inc's immunotherapy
column6: for patients with the most common form of lung cancer whose tumors produce a specific biological marker. Oct 2 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration granted accelerated approval for Merck & Co's  immunotherapy
column8: in patients with a form of lung cancer.UPDATE 3-U.S. FDA expands approval of Merck's Keytruda to lung cancer Oct 2 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Friday approved Merck & Co Inc's immunotherapy
column10: for patients with the most common form of lung cancer whose tumors produce a specific biological marker.

column2: Mexico says Microsoft plans major investment in Mexico MEXICO CITY
column3: Oct 2 Microsoft Corp has pledged to invest around $1 billion in Mexico between this year and 2018 to promote education and access to information technology in the country

column2: U.S. Supreme Court's business docket targets class actions WASHINGTON
column3: Oct 2 Big business is urging the U.S. Supreme Court to curb class action litigation in a series of cases that dominate the nine justices' business docket in the coming months.

column2: United Airlines and maintenance workers' union pause contract talksUnited Airlines and maintenance workers' union pause contract talks United Continental Holdings Inc and its maintenance workers' union said on Friday that they paused talks on a new contract after a rival airline tentatively agreed to a wage increase.
